name: Crime Gangs Chase Simulator: Extreme Cops Justice
name_original: Crime Gangs Chase Simulator: Extreme Cops Justice
description:
Crime on the streets is on the rise. Criminals are on the loose and they aren’t stopping at nothing to wreak havoc in the city and cause as much destruction as possible. The criminals are spread throughout the city, looting citizens, rampaging local shops and creating problems for the local police.

Where the local cops and law enforcement have failed to contain the situation, it’s time for you to step in as the action vigilante against this crime spree. Thankfully enough, the criminals are your average day robbers, thugs and cons looking to make a quick living out of citizens, so casualties are to a minimum. But you need to be extra speedy and vigilant to track down the crimes happening throughout the city and make a run for these criminals, chase them down and bust them before they vanish into thin air.


BUST CRIMINALS AND TRICKY CRIMINALS

You’ll be alerted as soon as a crime is reported on the news and you have to make a move for the crime scene and catch the criminals in the act, bust them and retrieve any belongings they might have stolen.

FEATURES
Lots of new crime busting missions with specific AI for each criminal type
Number of crime fighter characters to choose from. Customize your character with new weapons and outfits to enter the world of crime
An interactive crime fighting experience for mobile devices
Chase criminals and bust them in the shortest possible time
High quality 3d city environment with engaging mechanics
